subSections.title: Glyph origin
Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[damage]]; to [[injure]]
# to [[kill]]
# to be [[left]]; to [[remain]]
# [[severe]]; [[cruel]]
# [[damaged]]; [[defective]]
